Key Match Events: Pakistan sealed the series with a 6 wicket win
Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan stitched a stand of 139 runs
Shaheen Afridi took 3 wickets for 14 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan were favorites to win the series
Ireland were looking to finish the series on a high
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam said the Irish batters were batting brilliantly in the first half but his bowlers put pressure by taking few wickets
Lorcan Tucker said it was a privilege to lead the team and the bowlers bowled in tough conditions
Shaheen Afridi said the bowlers tried to hit good lines and lengths and it is important to get the team ready before the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Dublin on May 14, 2024
The Irish bowlers tried their best but they never looked like they could turn the tides in their favour
Others: The match was not a big surprise to see Pakistan cruise through so comfortably
Ireland were well under-par on this kind of pitch
